rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with a vestibule that leads to the living areas and provides direct access to wheelchair ramps. Features include open design for accessibility.

rooms.name: Living Room/Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious dual-purpose area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering natural light. The layout is designed to be open and accessible for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern, compact kitchen with accessible cabinetry and appliances designed for mobility. Includes provisions for wheelchair maneuverability.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment room with built-in seating and audio-visual systems, featuring soundproof walls. Accessible design ensures comfortable viewing for all.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom featuring a large balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows and wheelchair accessible fixtures. The room layout aligns with Vastu principles for restful sleep.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: An accessible bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with grab bars and non-slip surfaces. Designed for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet space ideal for work or reading, designed with ample lighting and accessible storage. Includes features to support wheelchair mobility.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with a balcony for relaxation. Accessible design includes lower bed height and clear movement space.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: An accessible guest bathroom with safety features for wheelchair users, including grab bars and non-slip flooring.

openings.description: A wide, accessible main entrance door featuring a ramp for wheelchair access.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on each balcony provide natural light and visual connectivity with the outdoors.
Large windows ensure ample daylight, enhancing the open feel of the space.
